text:
If you Edit a doc in default pub with bxe and save that doc, it is not possible
to rollback to the last revision in Site->Revision menu.
When trying it a new revision appears and nothing else.
Also viewing a specific revision does not work.
creator: mail@rolf-kulemann.com

text:
Ok, rolin' back works, but a new revision is created.
I think this isn't ok.
creator: mail@rolf-kulemann.com
mail@rolf-kulemann.com
text:
Sometimes it works.
I couldn't spot a pattern of occurance yet.
this is by design. arguably, it could be changed, but wont for 1.2
creator: edith@apache.org
